# ManipulationComponent.AudioConfiguration

**Structure**

A configuration for audio playback during an interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AudioConfiguration
```

## Type Properties

- **default**: The default configuration. The system will apply default sounds as the user interacts with the object.
- **none**: The system will not apply any sounds.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
